reviewText:
Thorough analysis of Watergate. Prophetic, considering the current political climate.

Must-see.
Just watched this, very informative. Lots of similarities to Trump !! A must watch.
Please. Please make this available for US, Canada , et al consumption.  It is too important a documentary to not be readily available.

This highly-informative DVD should be READILY-available at all times.  It's necessary to keep historical events in perspective as previously-little-known-or-unknown aspects are learned in the years and decades that follow their occurrances.  Please get this done!

Amazon you simply must provide this documentary to the general public. It is an incredibly important and informative piece of work and I can guarantee if made available you will sell out of it in short order. Do whatever you have to to obtain this production and please let me know when it's available. I'm quite sure there are millions of people like me who would adore to add it to our collection. Thanks for the opportunity to present this request. Love, love, love your company.
